title: MARS GAMING MC-C MID TOWER WHITE METAL-MESH
title_fr: MARS GAMING MC-C MID TOWER WHITE METAL-MESH
description_fr:
MARS GAMING MC-C MID TOWER WHITE METAL-MESH

The MARS GAMING MC-C MID TOWER in White brings both aesthetics and functionality to your gaming setup. Designed with a sleek, professional look, this case combines a robust METAL-MESH front panel with three FRGB fans that enhance both air circulation and visual appeal. Its compact semitower form factor is ideal for users who want an efficient setup without sacrificing design or cooling performance.

Featuring advanced cooling solutions, the MC-C includes a triple front ventilation system by default and supports the installation of up to 8 additional fans for optimal airflow. Its design ensures that heat is effectively managed, with a dual-chamber layout that separates the power supply from other components to further improve system temperature management. Additionally, full liquid cooling support is available, compatible with 240mm and 120mm radiators, ensuring that even high-performance builds remain cool under pressure.

With ample internal capacity, the MC-C accommodates ATX, MicroATX, and Mini-ITX motherboards. Storage options include up to 4 internal drive bays, along with an efficient cable management system for clean and organized installations. The full side tempered glass window allows for an impressive display of components and lighting, making this case an ideal choice for gamers seeking a blend of style and functionality in their builds.
miniDescription_fr:

  • CPU Cooler Max Height: 158mm

  • Liquid Cooling Support: 240mm, 120mm front / *120mm rear (compatible with 120mm liquid coolers with radiators up to 157mm long)
  • Fan Capacity: Up to 8x 120mm
  • Included Components: 3x 120mm front FRGB fans
  • Internal Dimensions: Width-18.4cm, Height-42cm, Length-29.5cm
  • Power Connectors: MOLEX (fans)
